agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 10:00 AM, Monday, March 11, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 114 White Relating to providing public high school students information regarding the availability of college credit awarded for military experience, education, and training obtained during military service. HB 260 Blanco Relating to the creation of a cross-border motor vehicle traffic congestion web portal. HB 680 Deshotel Relating to the evaluation of and improvements to the quality of the Texas Workforce Commission's subsidized child care program. HB 885 Raney | et al. Relating to wage requirements for community rehabilitation programs participating in the purchasing from people with disabilities program. HB 1588 Metcalf Relating to the deadline for certain economic development corporations to file a certain report with the comptroller. HB 2223 Frullo Relating to the exemption of certain commercial weighing or measuring devices from registration and inspection requirements. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
